CNMI bans Hawaiian live poultry and hatching egg imports after bird flu detection on O'ahu https://www.nzherald.co.nz/talanoa/cnmi-bans-hawaiian-live-poultry-and-hatching-egg-imports-after-bird-flu-detection-on-oahu/2EOPQWJRAZCIJFYD35IAHJGWQY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/talanoa/cnmi-bans-hawaiian-live-poultry-and-hatching-egg-imports-after-bird-flu-detection-on-oahu/2EOPQWJRAZCIJFYD35IAHJGWQY/ The ban has been put in place to prevent bird flu exposure. Mon, 18 Nov 2024 19:54:07 +0000 The Tauranga Moana Manu Champs is a popular event in Tauranga. Supplied photo.
Pike River mine disaster: Police work with Crown Solicitor over decision to lay charges https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/pike-river-mine-disaster-police-work-with-crown-solicitor-over-decision-to-lay-charges/JRVY4AWL2RDSFPSW3ASENLYJ4Y/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/pike-river-mine-disaster-police-work-with-crown-solicitor-over-decision-to-lay-charges/JRVY4AWL2RDSFPSW3ASENLYJ4Y/ Police confirm they are working with Crown Solicitor on prosecution case. Hīkoi to Parliament live updates: Thousands descend on Wellington in historic day of mass protest https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hikoi-to-parliament-live-updates-thousands-descend-on-wellington-in-historic-day-of-mass-protest/HGI2Z5XVYBCXVHNDGPSFGWPFBQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/hikoi-to-parliament-live-updates-thousands-descend-on-wellington-in-historic-day-of-mass-protest/HGI2Z5XVYBCXVHNDGPSFGWPFBQ/ The hīkoi is expected to arrive at Parliament around midday. Mon, 18 Nov 2024 18:16:00 +0000 Marchers are heading down Featherston St past the train station. Up to 30,000 people are expected to join the Hīkoi mō te Tiriti marching on Parliament this morning in opposition to Act’s Treaty Principles Bill. Photo / Melissa Nightingale
